##makeCacheMatrix Function

makeCacheMatrix<-function(x)
{ solve(x)}

##cacheSolve Function

cacheSolve<-function(x)
{
if(x==makeCacheMatrix(x))
{solve(x)}
else
{ solve(makeCacheMatrix(x))}
}
